reviewText: Dirty packaging but I remember why I fell in love with this show back in the 90s.  I should have just bought the entire series for ten dollars more.

Newsradio is one of our family's most favorite TV series! It's Dave Foley and Phil Hartman at their absolute best! This show is well written and flawlessly acted and directed. Everyone who worked on this show must be so proud of their work.

I picked up the NewsRadio Fan Favorites DVD as a gift. It looks like a pretty good deal and includes these Season 3 episodes: Christmas The Trainer Rap Led Zeppelin Boxed Set Complaint Box Rose Bowl Kids Airport Twins --- I got a chance to see the DVD. It is simply Disc 2 from Newsradio - The Complete Third Season. The packaging is different, but the menu and selections appear to be the same.
